title: Escape velocity on planet X from astronaut weight

content.prompt: A rocket has landed on Planet X, which has half the radius of Earth. An astronaut onboard the rocket weighs twice as much on Planet X as on Earth. If the escape velocity for the rocket taking off from Earth is v0 , then its escape velocity on Planet X is

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
